description: An adversary may compress data (e.g., sensitive documents) that is collected prior to exfiltration in order to make it portable and minimize the amount of data sent over the network. Author: Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of archiving tools by legitimate user.
name: Data Compressed
query: (type:"execve" AND (a0:"zip" OR (a0:"gzip" AND a1:"\-f") OR (a0:"tar" AND a1:*\-c*)))
